text: a swirl bread is when you take any bread
dough and then you put something
delicious in between and you roll it up
and that's what's so great about a swirl
bread is that you can tailor it to your
tastes so what I have here is the Risen
dough it started it was this big and it
grew to be when bread recipes tell you
to punch the dough down you don't need
to punch punching is violent bread dough
is a living thing you want to treat it
gently I wanted an 8 by 16 inch
rectangle because then when I roll it up
it'll fit nicely into my 9-inch bread
pan come on down for cinnamon raisin
bread I used cinnamon and raisins and
brown sugar and one secret ingredient
and that's sherry
you want to make sure to spread the rays
a mixture out evenly you know always go
to the edge because you don't want those
edge pieces to not have raisins that
would be sad so be mindful it's like
making a sandwich spread to the edge
this is how you check if it's done you
wanna and it should sound hollow when I
was testing it occurred to me that you
could use orange marmalade you could use
ginger lemon or you could use dulce de
leche and toasted coconut this is the
kind of bread recipe that you can just
have con
